title: A Lesson from Dr. Subramaniam Swamy to Sri Lanka’s minority Tamils and Muslims
content: Known for his candid demeanor and straight talk, Dr. Subramaniam Swamy did not mince his words during his eagerly awaited speech at the 4th consecutive Defense Seminar held at the Galadari Hotel from 18-20th August 2014.
